meaningMnemonic: Someone <radical>thread</radical>ed a <radical>turtle</radical> into long skinny pieces, making a <kanji>rope</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The person making these threaded turtle <kanji>rope</kanji>s is none other than the local farmhand <reading>Joe</reading> (じょう). You watch him stretch and peel pieces of turtle off of turtles, then thread them together into a rope.
